Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery slightly ribbed vessel, the exterior is covered with a red slip, both the interior and the exterior bear faint traces of a black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395011) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395011)
